item.description:
You are invited to my next RAW Food Preparation Seminar.  In this seminar, you will learn:

  • What a raw and living food diet is all about.
  • How to make delicious raw food meals simply and easily.
  • How to shop for raw foods, and we will create a RAW food pantry list.
  • How to stock your kitchen and set up your environment.
  • Kitchen equipment use
  • Menu Planning and Shopping Lists
  • Sprouting and Dehydration
  • We will prepare a seven course meal.

 

If you are interested in attending, please contact me, or copy this link into your browser for the information and registration page for this event.

http://events.constantcontact.com/register/event?lr=hu9nrziab&oeidk=a07e5ga6n2l65cd1141

Course Fee is $150.00


I am looking forward to seeing you at this class and sharing some wonderful food with you. If you can't make it this time, I look forward to seeing you next time.
Please feel free to forward this to all of your friends.   Thank you for your attention and response.

Kindest Regards,

 Sue Comeau

Sue's RAW and Vegan Kitchen

suecomeau@comcast.net

978-407-1555
item.name: RAW Food Preparation Class, Saturday, January 14, 2012 10-3 PM
